name: Below Deck
description:
—--------------------------Transmission------------------

Below Deck is a cooperative storytelling based game.

You explore the wreckage of the ship as part of a Crew, each with their own separate abilities.

It turns out though, something is on this ship. And it wants to become one.

Inspired by the likes of Alien and Dead by Daylight, work together to fight off the infected known as Remnants and complete your Crew Goals and escape from the wreckage. 

—----------------------Final Transmission Received—------
